title: Bitcoin price falls below $90,000 amid AI jitters after Oracle results
description: The cryptocurrency’s value falls as poor results from billionaire Larry Ellison’s tech company raised concerns about investment in artificial intelligence
content:
Stock markets in Asia fell and equity futures pointed to the US opening down. Trading was subdued in London and Germany.
Standard Chartered cut its expectations that bitcoin would hit $200,000 by the end of 2025, lowering its forecast to $100,000.

title: Open AI, Microsoft face lawsuit over ChatGPT’s alleged role in Connecticut murder
description: The heirs of an 83-year-old Connecticut woman are suing ChatGPT maker OpenAI and its business partner Microsoft for wrongful death, alleging that the artificial intelligence chatbot intensified her son’s “paranoid delusions” and helped direct them at his mother before he killed her.

title: Bitcoin Plunges Below $90,000 - Why Did It Slump?
description: Bitcoin's surge in 2025 encountered a setback, dipping below $90,000 amid a broader cryptocurrency selloff triggered by concerns over artificial intelligence (AI) investments and disappointing earnings from Oracle. , Economy, Times Now
content:
The world's largest cryptocurrency fell as much as 3 intraday, last trading down 2.5 at 90,056.24, erasing gains from the past two days and extending weakness that began during US trading on Wednesday.

title: ‘India to become number one community in…,’ says Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella in Bengaluru: Here’s what you need to know
description: Nadella stated that the artificial intelligence era demands a complete rethinking of how technology is built, calling for an urgent transition to an AI-driven Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC).
content:
Microsoft Chairman and CEO Satya Nadella has stated that he sees India as the future global leader in software development, potentially seeing that the country is “slated to become the number one community in the world with GitHub by 2030.”

title: EXCLUSIVE | Netflix & Kiran Rao's 'Humans in the Loop' actor Sonal Madhushankar: ‘My caste and gender have already instilled fear in my DNA, but now…’
description: Netflix’s Humans in the Loop explores the human labour and cultural biases behind artificial intelligence. In an EXCLUSIVE interview with Firstpost’s Lachmi Deb Roy for ‘Not Just Bollywood’, actress Sonal Madhushankar talks about her role, her journey in the entertainment industry, future of independent cinema and more.
content: Director Aranya Sahay’s debut feature film, Humans in the Loop (2024/2025), a Hindi-Kurukh drama about is about an Adivasi woman in Jharkhand who labels data for AI, exploring themes of hidden labour, technology ethics, and Indigenous knowledge versu... [6871 chars]

title: 'India will lead the AI era': Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella announces 20 million AI skilling drive across country
description: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella is set to empower 20 million Indians with artificial intelligence skills. The company is investing $17.5 billion to boost India's AI and cloud infrastructure. A new data centre region will launch in 2026. India is projected to become the world's largest developer community by 2030. This marks a significant long-term partnership in India's technological advancement.
content:

title: Open AI, Microsoft Face Lawsuit Over ChatGPT's Alleged Role in Connecticut Murder-Suicide
description: SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — The heirs of an 83-year-old Connecticut woman are suing ChatGPT maker OpenAI and its business partner Microsoft for wrongful death, alleging that the artificial intelligence chatbot intensified her son's “paranoid delusions” and helped direct them at his mother before he killed her.

title: AI-based tool predicts future cardiovascular events in patients with angina
description: Reduced coronary blood flow, measured with an artificial intelligence-based imaging tool, predicted future cardiovascular events in patients with suspected stable coronary artery disease. These findings were presented at EACVI 2025, the congress of the European Association of Cardiovascular Imaging (EACVI).
